trans-unit.source: Determine monitoring and reporting capabilities for the hybrid identity solution that can be leveraged by IT to take actions to identify and mitigate a potential threats
trans-unit.target: Determine monitoring and reporting capabilities for the hybrid identity solution that can be leveraged by IT to take actions to identify and mitigate a potential threats

trans-unit.source: Determine incident response requirements for your hybrid identity solution
trans-unit.target: Determine incident response requirements for your hybrid identity solution

trans-unit.source: Large or medium organizations most likely will have a [security incident response](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/cc700825.aspx) in place to help IT take actions accordingly to the level of incident.
trans-unit.target: Large or medium organizations most likely will have a [security incident response](https://technet.microsoft.com/library/cc700825.aspx) in place to help IT take actions accordingly to the level of incident.

trans-unit.source: The identity management system is an important component in the incident response process because it can be used to help identifying who performed a specific action against the target.
trans-unit.target: The identity management system is an important component in the incident response process because it can be used to help identifying who performed a specific action against the target.

trans-unit.source: The hybrid identity solution must be able to provide monitoring and reporting capabilities that can be leveraged by IT to take actions to identify and mitigate a potential threat.
trans-unit.target: The hybrid identity solution must be able to provide monitoring and reporting capabilities that can be leveraged by IT to take actions to identify and mitigate a potential threat.

trans-unit.source: In a typical incident response plan you will have the following phases as part of the plan:
trans-unit.target: In a typical incident response plan you will have the following phases as part of the plan:

trans-unit.source: Initial assessment.
trans-unit.target: Initial assessment.

trans-unit.source: Incident communication.
trans-unit.target: Incident communication.

trans-unit.source: Damage control and risk reduction.
trans-unit.target: Damage control and risk reduction.

trans-unit.source: Identification of what it was compromise and severity.
trans-unit.target: Identification of what it was compromise and severity.

trans-unit.source: Evidence preservation.
trans-unit.target: Evidence preservation.

trans-unit.source: Notification to appropriate parties.
trans-unit.target: Notification to appropriate parties.

trans-unit.source: System recovery.
trans-unit.target: System recovery.

trans-unit.source: Documentation.
trans-unit.target: Documentation.

trans-unit.source: Damage and cost assessment.
trans-unit.target: Damage and cost assessment.

trans-unit.source: Process and plan revision.
trans-unit.target: Process and plan revision.

trans-unit.source: During the identification of what it was compromise and severity- phase, it will be necessary to identify the systems that have been compromised, files that have been accessed and determine the sensitivity of those files.
trans-unit.target: During the identification of what it was compromise and severity- phase, it will be necessary to identify the systems that have been compromised, files that have been accessed and determine the sensitivity of those files.

trans-unit.source: Your hybrid identity system should be able to fulfill these requirements to assist you identifying the user that made those changes.
trans-unit.target: Your hybrid identity system should be able to fulfill these requirements to assist you identifying the user that made those changes.

trans-unit.source: Monitoring and reporting
trans-unit.target: Monitoring and reporting

trans-unit.source: Many times the identity system can also help in initial assessment phase mainly if the system has built in auditing and reporting capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Many times the identity system can also help in initial assessment phase mainly if the system has built in auditing and reporting capabilities.

trans-unit.source: During the initial assessment, IT Admin must be able to identify a suspicious activity, or the system should be able to trigger it automatically based on a pre-configured task.
trans-unit.target: During the initial assessment, IT Admin must be able to identify a suspicious activity, or the system should be able to trigger it automatically based on a pre-configured task.

trans-unit.source: Many activities could indicate a possible attack, however in other cases, a badly configured system might lead to a number of false positives in an intrusion detection system.
trans-unit.target: Many activities could indicate a possible attack, however in other cases, a badly configured system might lead to a number of false positives in an intrusion detection system.

trans-unit.source: The identity management system should assist IT admins to identify and report those suspicious activities.
trans-unit.target: The identity management system should assist IT admins to identify and report those suspicious activities.

trans-unit.source: Usually these technical requirements can be fulfilled by monitoring all systems and having a reporting capability that can highlight potential threats.
trans-unit.target: Usually these technical requirements can be fulfilled by monitoring all systems and having a reporting capability that can highlight potential threats.

trans-unit.source: Use the questions below to help you design your hybrid identity solution while taking into consideration incident response requirements:
trans-unit.target: Use the questions below to help you design your hybrid identity solution while taking into consideration incident response requirements:

trans-unit.source: Does your company has a security incident response in place?
trans-unit.target: Does your company has a security incident response in place?

trans-unit.source: If yes, is the current identity management system used as part of the process?
trans-unit.target: If yes, is the current identity management system used as part of the process?

trans-unit.source: Does your company need to identify suspicious sign-on attempts from users across different devices?
trans-unit.target: Does your company need to identify suspicious sign-on attempts from users across different devices?

trans-unit.source: Does your company need to detect potential compromised user’s credentials?
trans-unit.target: Does your company need to detect potential compromised user’s credentials?

trans-unit.source: Does your company need to audit user’s access and action?
trans-unit.target: Does your company need to audit user’s access and action?

trans-unit.source: Does your company need to know when a user reset his password?
trans-unit.target: Does your company need to know when a user reset his password?

trans-unit.source: Policy enforcement
trans-unit.target: Policy enforcement

trans-unit.source: During damage control and risk reduction-phase, it is important to quickly reduce the actual and potential effects of an attack.
trans-unit.target: During damage control and risk reduction-phase, it is important to quickly reduce the actual and potential effects of an attack.

trans-unit.source: That action that you will take at this point can make the difference between a minor and a major one.
trans-unit.target: That action that you will take at this point can make the difference between a minor and a major one.

trans-unit.source: The exact response will depend on your organization and the nature of the attack that you face.
trans-unit.target: The exact response will depend on your organization and the nature of the attack that you face.

trans-unit.source: If the initial assessment concluded that an account was compromised, you will need to enforce policy to block this account.
trans-unit.target: If the initial assessment concluded that an account was compromised, you will need to enforce policy to block this account.

trans-unit.source: That’s just one example where the identity management system will be leveraged.
trans-unit.target: That’s just one example where the identity management system will be leveraged.

trans-unit.source: Use the questions below to help you design your hybrid identity solution while taking into consideration how policies will be enforced to react to an ongoing incident:
trans-unit.target: Use the questions below to help you design your hybrid identity solution while taking into consideration how policies will be enforced to react to an ongoing incident:

trans-unit.source: Does your company have policies in place to block users from access the network if necessary?
trans-unit.target: Does your company have policies in place to block users from access the network if necessary?

trans-unit.source: If yes, does the current solution integrate with the hybrid identity management system that you are going to adopt?
trans-unit.target: If yes, does the current solution integrate with the hybrid identity management system that you are going to adopt?

trans-unit.source: Does your company need to enforce conditional access for users that are in quarantine?
trans-unit.target: Does your company need to enforce conditional access for users that are in quarantine?
